nodes.documentation:
@dev Initializer. Can only be called once.
@param _token The address where the ERC20 token contract is deployed
nodes.name: init
apply
challenge

nodes.documentation:
Updates a listingHash status from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is being updated
nodes.name: updateStatus

nodes.documentation:
Updates an array of listingHashes statuses from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.
@param _listingHashes The listingHashes whose status are being updated
nodes.name: updateStatuses
withdraw

nodes.documentation:
Initialize an exit timer for a listing to leave the whitelist
@param _listingHash	A listing hash msg.sender is the owner of
nodes.name: initExit

nodes.documentation:
Allow a listing to leave the whitelist
@param _listingHash A listing hash msg.sender is the owner of
nodes.name: finalizeExit
claimReward
claimRewards
get
voterReward

nodes.documentation:
Determines whether the given listingHash be whitelisted.
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is to be examined
nodes.name: canBeWhitelisted
appPeriodActive

nodes.documentation:
Returns true if the provided listingHash is whitelisted
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is to be examined
nodes.name: isWhitelisted

nodes.documentation:
Returns true if apply was called for this listingHash
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is to be examined
nodes.name: appWasMade

nodes.documentation:
Returns true if the application/listingHash has an unresolved challenge
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is to be examined
nodes.name: challengeExists

nodes.documentation:
Determines whether voting has concluded in a challenge for a given listingHash. Throws if no challenge exists.
@param _listingHash A listingHash with an unresolved challenge
nodes.name: challengeCanBeResolved

nodes.documentation:
Determines the number of tokens awarded to the winning party in a challenge.
@param _challengeID The challengeID to determine a reward for
nodes.name: determineReward
tokenClaims
resolveChallenge
whitelistApplication

nodes.documentation:
Deletes a listingHash from the whitelist and transfers tokens back to owner
@param _listingHash The listing hash to delete
nodes.name: resetListing
set
